var APIURL='';switch(window.location.hostname){// this is the local host name of your react app
case'localhost'||'127.0.0.1':// this is the local host name of your API
APIURL='http://localhost:3001';break;// this is the deployed react application
case'https://draft-list.herokuapp.com/':// this is the full url of your deployed API
APIURL=' https://draft-list.herokuapp.com/';}export default APIURL;
